fields.schemeName: PMMSY: Establishment of small RAS /Biofloc culture system - Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides capital assistance for setting up small-scale Recirculatory Aquaculture Systems (RAS) and Biofloc culture systems to promote high-yield, sustainable fish farming.

fields.schemeShortTitle: SUPPORT FOR QUALITY-UP-GRADATION / ECO CERTIFICATION / FPOS
fields.schemeName: Coffee Development Programme in Non-Traditional Areas (NTA) : Support for Quality-Up-Gradation / Eco Certification / FPOs
fields.briefDescription: To facilitate improvement of quality of coffee produced by the tribal growers by encouraging them to put up infrastructure for quality improvement and also facilitate them to obtain organic certification of their coffees, so as to enable them to earn better returns.
tags: Support For Quality-Up-Gradation Eco Certification FPOs

fields.schemeName: Coffee Development Programme in Non-Traditional Areas (NTA) : Support for Coffee Expansion
fields.briefDescription: To increase the area and production of Arabica coffee in association with the State level Nodal agencies in Andhra Pradesh and Odisha, so as to facilitate afforestation in the Podu lands and to help settle the tribals on a permanent footing.

fields.schemeShortTitle: TRANSIT / FREIGHT ASSISTANCE FOR COFFEE EXPORTS
fields.schemeName: Market Development and Export Promotion : Assistance for Coffee Exports
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to maximize export earnings by enhancing the market share of value-added coffees as Made in India Brand and high value differentiated green coffees in important high value far-off markets.

fields.schemeName: Development Support for Coffee growers of North- Eastern Region (NER) : Support for Coffee Expansion
fields.briefDescription: To facilitate afforestation in the Jhum lands and help to settle the tribal holdings on permanent footing and also to increase the production.

fields.schemeName: Free Travel in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation Buses to Widowed Daughters-in-law of Freedom Fighters
fields.briefDescription: "Free Travel in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation Buses to Widowed Daughters-in-law of Freedom Fighters" is a social welfare scheme that provides free transport services in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation Buses to the widowed daughters-in-laws of the Freedom Fighters of the state.

fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana: Medium Fish Feed Mill of Production Capacity of 8 Ton/Day
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to promote fish feed self-sufficiency and affordability among fish farmers. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided for setting up medium-sized fish feed mills with a production capacity of 8 tons per day, benefiting entrepreneurs and fish farmers.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to SC Students Appearing in the Mains Examination of UPSC
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides financial grants to the SC students for appearing in the UPSC Mains Exam. An amount upto ₹50,000/- is provided to each beneficiary, subject to budget provision. The assistance is extended depending on the applicant satisfying the eligibility criteria and the documents submitted.

fields.schemeName: Financial Incentive to SC Meritorious Girls Students
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides financial incentives worth ₹5,000/- to the meritorious girls from Scheduled Castes who have secured 80% or above marks in the HSLC examination. To objective is to motivate and encourage SC students to pursue higher studies and bring them at par with the rest.

fields.schemeName: PMMSY: Ice Plant/Cold Store of minimum 10-ton capacity Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The subsidy for 10-ton capacity ice plant/cold storage units under Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY) supports the establishment of ice plants or cold storage facilities with a minimum capacity of 10 tons to improve fish preservation and cold chain infrastructure in Haryana.

fields.schemeName: PMMSY: Provision of Polythene lining for the Construction of New ponds for Saline/Alkaline area-Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide central assistance for the cost of polythene lining for new ponds in saline/alkaline areas. Through this scheme, polythene lining costs are provided to beneficiaries constructing new water bodies for fish/shrimp culture.

fields.schemeShortTitle: SUPPORT FOR QUALITY UPGRADATION / ECO CERTIFICATION / FPOS
fields.schemeName: Development Support for Coffee growers of North- Eastern Region (NER) : Support for Quality upgradation / Eco Certification / FPOs
fields.briefDescription: To facilitate improvement of quality of coffee produced by the growers by encouraging them to put up infrastructure for quality improvement and also facilitate them to obtain certification of their coffees, so as to enable them to earn better returns.
tags: Support For Quality Upgradation Eco Certification FPOs

fields.schemeName: Coffee Development Programme in Non-Traditional Areas (NTA) : Construction of Cement Drying Yards
fields.briefDescription: To facilitate improvement of quality of coffee produced by the tribal growers by encouraging them to put up infrastructure for quality improvement and also facilitate them to obtain organic certification of their coffees, so as to enable them to earn better returns.

fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Uchchatar Shiksha Protsahan Yojana: Central Sector Interest Subsidy Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides full interest subsidy during the moratorium period on loan availed under Model Education Loan Scheme of Indian Banks’ Association (IBA) to students belonging to economically weaker sections whose annual parental income is up to ₹4.5 Lakhs from all sources.

fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Vidyalaxmi (PM-Vidyalaxmi) Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Pradhan Mantri Vidyalaxmi (Pm-vidyalaxmi) Scheme" aims to provide financial support for higher education through education loans. Under this scheme, financial assistance of up to ₹10,00,000/- is provided to meritorious students seeking admission to domestic institutions.

fields.schemeName: PMMSY: Installation of Cages in Reservoirs Scheme - Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to promote cage fish farming. It provides grants per unit to the individuals and groups for sustainable aquaculture practices.

fields.schemeName: "Interest Subvention on Working Capital" under the "Assam Tea Industries Special Incentives Scheme"
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to ensure long term financial sustainability of the Tea industry and incentivize Orthodox tea production over Crush, Tear, Curl tea. It provides interest subvention, production subsidies, plant & machinery subsidies, tax holidays to tea plantations and manufacturing units in Assam.

fields.schemeName: PMMSY: Insulated Vehicles - Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide a subsidy per unit for purchasing insulated vehicles for the beneficiaries to promote cold-chain logistics in fish transportation.

fields.schemeName: Mahila Swayamsiddha Yojana Rajasthan
fields.briefDescription: The scheme objective is to provide free skill training and self-employment support to widowed, abandoned, and destitute women through voluntary organizations. The scheme is implemented by the Social Justice and Empowerment Department with financial assistance provided to participating NGOs.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister Small and Marginal Farmers Older Pension Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Chief Minister Small and Marginal Farmers Older Pension Scheme" by the Department of Social Justice and Empowerment, Government of Rajasthan, aims to provide financial assistance to elderly small and marginal farmers.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Anusuchit Jati Evam Anusuchit Janjati Chhatrawas Anudan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The “Mukhyamantri Anusoochit Jaati Evam Anusoochit Janajati Chhatrawas Anudan Yojana” was launched by the SC and ST Welfare Department, Government of Bihar aims to provide financial assistance in every month to the students studying in Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe hostels.

fields.schemeName: PMMSY: Live Fish Vending Centres Scheme - Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support fishers by providing financial assistance for live fish vending centers. A subsidy per unit is provided under PMMSY.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for the Welfare of Schedule Caste Families in Fisheries Sector: Subsidy on 2nd Year to 5th Year Lease Money
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to provide full-time employment to individuals from Scheduled Caste families in the fisheries sector and uplift their economic status by promoting fish farming through financial assistance for leasing Panchayati ponds or watershed areas.

fields.schemeName: Scheme to Provide Financial Assistance for Translation of Scholarly Works
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to encourage cultural exchange and literary development by providing financial assistance for translating high-quality literary and research works between Gujarati and other Indian languages.

fields.schemeName: State Art Exhibition Competition
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "State Art Exhibition Competition" by the Sports, Youth and Cultural Activities Department, Government of Gujarat aims to promote fine arts and recognize artistic talents by providing awards and scholarships to artists, art students, and school children across Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Junior/Senior Fellowship in the Field of Fine Arts
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Junior/Senior Fellowship in the Field of Fine Arts" by the Sports, Youth and Cultural Activities Department, Government of Gujarat, aims to support artistic innovation and research by offering fellowships to young and senior artists in Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Mukhya Mantri Matritva Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Mukhya Mantri Matritva Sahayata Yojana" by the Women and Child Development Department, Haryana, aims to provide a cash incentive of ₹5,000/- during maternity to eligible pregnant and lactating women on the birth of a second child (boy).

fields.schemeName: Safety Audit
fields.briefDescription: The Safety Audit Scheme by the Government of Haryana aims to promote safety practices within Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) by supporting them in conducting safety audits and implementing safety equipment.
